OpCfmdMLWqZI8MIL.name: Spike Driver
OpCfmdMLWqZI8MIL.description:
Requirements: A piercing melee weapon, a hammer, a hand free

Immediately after hitting a target with a melee weapon that deals piercing damage, you may strike the pommel or haft with the hammer, driving the weapon further into the target. The target takes an additional 1d6 points of piercing damage, and you treat the initial attack roll as if you had rolled a result 2 better on the d20 (to a maximum of 20) potentially turning it into a critical hit.
